TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit StorageAccountOperationsExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The Service Management API provides programmatic access to much of the functionality available through the Management Portal. The Service Management API is a REST API. All API operations are performed over SSL and are mutually authenticated using X.509 v3 certificates. (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/ee460799.aspx for more information)
